title: The Passionate Brood
description: The Plantagenets live, love and quarrel agian, rallying to the trumpet call of MRs. Barnes' inimitable talent, in this deft and zestful re-creaton of England and the Middle East in the time of the Crusades. This is the story of the flamboyant Richard Coeur de Lion, and of the fortunes of the people caught up in his campaigns of love and war.
author: Margaret Campbell Barnes
